Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Coarsely manufactured goblet that is deep and large, with a rounded conical base, restricted mouth and simple lip. It bears a pink slip, better preserved on the inside than on the outside. Black patches indicating fire clouding are visible on the latter. Both surfaces were polished.
